title: Slow News Day
description: When Californian, Katharine Washington, comes to England to work on a newspaper she's expecting more than the small and troubled Wheatstone Mercury. Here she enters the world of office politics, the bottom line, personal and professional strife and lost hamsters. Will it be enough to lure her away from the bright lights and opportunities of home? From the Eisner nominated creator of Skeleton Key and Breakfast After Noon, this is a new edition, in a smaller format with a new cover by Andi Watson.
author: Andi Watson
